your_data_callout: This is the list of all the objects you can send to Marble, as well as their properties. Get in touch with the Marble team if you'd like to make changes to your data model.
links_from_table: Links from to other entities from <TableLocale>{{tableName}}</TableLocale>
create_field.title: Create a new field
create_field.is_enum.title: This field is an enumerated value
create_field.is_enum.subtitle: It takes a limited number of distinct values, like a status code
create_table.title: Create a new table
create_link.title: Create a new link
edit_field.title: Edit field
edit_field.is_unique.toggle: If toggled, duplicate values (two objects sharing the same value for this field) will not be allowed
edit_field.is_unique.cannot_toggle_index: The unicity constraint on the field is currently being created. Please wait for the operation to complete before untoggling this setting.
edit_field.is_unique.cannot_untoggle_fie: A link from another table pointing to this field exists. This requires the values being unique, so you cannot untoggle this setting.
edit_field.is_unique.warning_creation_as: Beware: creating the constraint that makes a field enforce unique values is asynchronous, and may take a while before being fully active. It may also fail if there already are duplicate values.
edit_field.is_unique.warning_untoggle: Beware: untoggling this setting will remove the constraint that enforces unique values on this field. If you need to enforce it again, it may take a while and may fail if duplicate values have been inserted in the meantime.
edit_table.title: Edit description
